Module it.polimi.ingsw.client.view

Package it.polimi.ingsw.utils

package it.polimi.ingsw.utils
  • Class
    Description
    BookshelfUtilities
    This class contains some methods to create a bookshelf.
    CliUtilities
    This class contains methods and constants used in the CLI, such as methods to ask questions and validate the answers and methods to print the board and the bookshelves.
    Color
    The color of an item.
    Coordinates
    This class is used to represent the coordinates of the items in the board
    SettingLoader
    This class provides methods to load the settings of the game from the JSON files and the properties file.
